title: SSVC display at the Volksworld Show

posts.content:

9. Terry (Rosie)
10. Sorry, we can't make it now, we have a party to go to! Friends are 50 only once, VoWo is there every year! Susie & Mike
11. Stephan & Lucy. you know where - all weekend
12. SpennysSplitty (Sunday) Inside preferably but out ok don't know how it works but we'll find out suppose.
13. dougall up (Saturday)
14. Claude aka Tesoro (Inside
15. gbsteve just let me know Ricky where and when you want us lol
16. Mark Bathtub57 - Saturday, in or out as you like
17. Agpul - both days and away from technology
18. Dannysrutter inside on Sunday only please.
19. Neal P inside on Saturday & Sunday please.
20. John Gatt (nhsjohn) Saturday please cheers.

28. Katelou - (Kate and Mark) Sunday please, - First time so be gentle

Blimy






Good turn out

Mark

Does anyone know what time and where we need to meet???
Thanks x
i assume we just turn up. names on the gate or something, is there a time we have to be there to get on site?

im quessing before it opens ,for health and safety
but could do with knowing this also
anyone ?????

Looking a last years thread you had to be there no later than 8.15am on both days.
I'm sure official info will go up soon.
